title: What are some of the most interesting paradoxes ever discovered? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yahoshua (Jesus to Americans) claimed to be the “Son of God” and the work of God was to believe in him. Christians claim that Jesus is God. Then they say he is also the son of God. How can he be God AND the son that came from God? The Old Testament says there is only one God and Jesus wasn’t even BORN yet. Will Christians go to heaven following a different God than the one that is in the Bible? We won’t know until we die which is true, which is the biggest paraox to be answered.

One would be moving two objects closer and closer. They can always get fifty percent closer and this process can go on infinite times. So they will never touch, but they will. The other is 'alternative facts' in Trump news briefings. It covered the lies that were regularly said
